text: For the purposes of §§ 5-206 to 5-208, the environs of the District of Columbia are hereby defined as embracing Arlington, Fairfax, Loudoun, Prince William, and Stafford Counties and the City of Alexandria in Virginia, and Prince George's, Charles, Anne Arundel, and Montgomery Counties in Maryland.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 4-208.

1973 Ed., § 4-211.

DC CODE § 5-208

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Police, Firefighters, Medical Examiner, and Forensic Sciences. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Environs of the District of Columbia defined.
